tool.name: cooler_balance
tool.description: Copy and balance a cool file.

param.name: input
param.label: Select the input cool file to balance.

param.name: madmax
param.label: Ignore bins from the contact matrix using the 'MAD-max' filter: bins whose log marginal sum is less than ``mad-max`` median absolute deviations below the median log marginal sum of all the bins in the same chromosome.

param.name: minnnz
param.label: Ignore bins from the contact matrix whose marginal number of nonzeros is less than this number.

param.name: mincount
param.label: Ignore bins from the contact matrix whose marginal count is less than this number.

param.name: ignorediags
param.label: Number of diagonals of the contact matrix to ignore, including the main diagonal. Examples: 0 ignores nothing, 1 ignores the main diagonal, 2 ignores diagonals (-1, 0, 1), etc.

param.name: tol
param.label: Threshold value of variance of the marginals for the algorithm to converge.

param.name: maxiters
param.label: Maximum number of iterations to perform if convergence is not achieved..

param.name: cisonly
param.label: Calculate weights against intra-chromosomal data only instead of genome-wide.

param.name: provideReg
param.label: Do you want to provide a bed file with regions to mask during the balancing procedure?

param.name: bedFile
param.label: Path to a 3-column BED file containing genomic regions to mask out during the balancing procedure, e.g. sequence gaps or regions of poor mappability.

tool.help:
**cooler cload** tool developped by mirnylab see https://github.com/mirnylab/cooler
command-line::
cp $input $output && cooler balance --mad-max madmax --min-nnz minnnz --min-count mincount --ignore-diags ignorediags --tol tol --max-iters maxiters cisonly -f --blacklist provideR.bedFile output
